00032  void init_pwm(){
00033 
00034         // ***************** RGB LED **********************
00035         DDRD |= _BV(PIND4) | _BV(PIND5) |  _BV(PIND0);
00036 
00037         // ***************** PWM LED WHITE ****************
00038   // B5 B6 PIN 4 5 LED WITHE 2 3 => OC1A OC1B
00039   TCCR1A = _BV(WGM10) | _BV(WGM11) | _BV(COM1A1) | _BV(COM1A0)| _BV(COM1B1) | _BV(COM1B0);
00040   TCCR1B = _BV(CS10);
00041   DDRB |= _BV(PINB4) | _BV(PINB5);
00042   OCR1A = 1000;                 /* set PWM value to 0 */
00043   OCR1B = 1000;
00044   
00045   // E4 PIN37 41 LED WITHE 1 0=> OC3B OC3A
00046   TCCR3A = _BV(WGM10) | _BV(WGM11) | _BV(COM3B1) | _BV(COM3B0) | _BV(COM3A1) | _BV(COM3A0);
00047   TCCR3B = _BV(CS10);
00048   DDRE |= _BV(PINE4) | _BV(PINE3);
00049   OCR3A = 1000;
00050   OCR3B = 1000;
00051 
00052         // ***************** INTERRUPTION TRACKBALL********
00053 /*DDRD &= ~ ((1<<PIND3) | (1<<PIND2) | (1<<PIND1) | (1<<PINE6) | (1<<PINE7)); // PD2 en entrée 
00054 EIMSK |= (1<<INT7) | (1<<INT6) | (1<<INT3) | (1<<INT2) | (1<<INT1); // Autorise l'interruption extérieure INT0 
00055 EICRA |= (1<<ISC31) | (1<<ISC21) | (1<<ISC11); // INT0 déclanché sur front descendant 
00056 EICRB |= (1<<ISC71) | (1<<ISC61);
00057 sei();*/
00058  }

00070 void setPWM1 (int val){
00071 OCR1A = val > 1024 ? 1023 : (val < 0 ? 0 : val);
00072 }
00073 void setPWM2 (int val){
00074 OCR1B = val > 1024 ? 1023 : (val < 0 ? 0 : val);
00075 }
00076 void setPWM3 (int val){
00077 OCR3A = val > 1024 ? 1023 : (val < 0 ? 0 : val);
00078 }
00079 void setPWM4 (int val){
00080 OCR3B = val > 1024 ? 1023 : (val < 0 ? 0 : val);
00081 }

00083 int getPWM1(){
00084 return OCR1A;
00085 }
00086 
00087 int getPWM2(){
00088 return OCR1B;
00089 }
00090 
00091 int getPWM3(){
00092 return OCR3A;

00095 int getPWM4(){
00096 return OCR3A;

00099 int getRed(){
00100 return (PORTD & (1<<PIND0)) >> PIND0;;
00101 }
00102 
00103 int getGreen(){
00104 return (PORTD & (1<<PIND4)) >> PIND4;
00105 }
00106 
00107 int getBlue(){
00108 return (PORTD & (1<<PIND5)) >> PIND5;
00109 }
00110 
00111 void setRed(int val){
00112 if(val > 0)
00113         PORTD |=  (1<<PIND0);
00114 
00115 else    PORTD &= ~(1<<PIND0);
00116 }
00117 
00118 void setGreen(int val){
00119 if(val > 0)
00120         PORTD |=  (1<<PIND4);
00121 else    PORTD &= ~(1<<PIND4);
00122 }
00123 
00124 void setBlue(int val){
00125 if(val > 0)
00126         PORTD |=  (1<<PIND5);
00127 else    PORTD &= ~(1<<PIND5);
00128 }

00130 // TRACK LEFT
00131 /*
00132 * Affiche les 8 combinaisons de couleurs sur la led par increment de un
00133 * Décallage des bits
00134 *
00135  ISR (INT6_vect){
00136         // 0011 0001
00137         char a =  (PORTD & (1<<PIND0));
00138         a |=  (PORTD & (1<<PIND4)) >> 3;
00139         a |=  (PORTD & (1<<PIND5)) >> 3;
00140 
00141         // 0000 0111
00142         a++;
00143         a %= 8;
00144 
00145         PORTD &= ~((1<<PIND4) | (1<<PIND5) | (1<<PIND0));
00146         // 0000 0111
00147         PORTD |= (a & 1);
00148         PORTD |= (a & 2) << 3;
00149         PORTD |= (a & 4) << 3;
00150         
00151         Red.value = (PORTD & (1<<PIND0)) >> PIND0;
00152         Green.value = (PORTD & (1<<PIND4)) >> PIND4;
00153         Blue.value = (PORTD & (1<<PIND5)) >> PIND5;
00154 } 
00155 
00156 // TRACK RIGHT
00157  ISR (INT7_vect){ 
00158         // 0011 0001
00159         char a =  (PORTD & (1<<PIND0));
00160         a |=  (PORTD & (1<<PIND4)) >> 3;
00161         a |=  (PORTD & (1<<PIND5)) >> 3;
00162 
00163         // 0000 0111
00164         a--;
00165         a %= 8;
00166 
00167         PORTD &= ~((1<<PIND4) | (1<<PIND5) | (1<<PIND0));
00168         // 0000 0111
00169         PORTD |= (a & 1);
00170         PORTD |= (a & 2) << 3;
00171         PORTD |= (a & 4) << 3;
00172 
00173         Red.value = (PORTD & (1<<PIND0)) >> PIND0;
00174         Green.value = (PORTD & (1<<PIND4)) >> PIND4;
00175         Blue.value = (PORTD & (1<<PIND5)) >> PIND5;

00178 // TRACK DOWN
00179  ISR (INT2_vect){ 
00180         OCR1A = (OCR1A+20) <= 1024 ? OCR1A+20 : 1024;
00181         OCR1B = (OCR1B+20) <= 1024 ? OCR1B+20 : 1024;
00182         OCR3A = (OCR3A+20) <= 1024 ? OCR3A+20 : 1024;
00183         OCR3B = (OCR3B+20) <= 1024 ? OCR3B+20 : 1024;
00184 
00185

00187         Green.value = (PORTD & (1<<PIND4)) >> PIND4;
00188         Blue.value = (PORTD & (1<<PIND5)) >> PIND5;
00189 
00190         White1.value = OCR1A;
00191         White2.value = OCR1B;
00192         White3.value = OCR3A;
00193         White4.value = OCR3B;
00194 } 
00195 
00196 // TRACK UP
00197  ISR (INT1_vect){ 
00198         OCR1A = (OCR1A-20) >= 0 ? OCR1A-20 : 0;
00199         OCR1B = (OCR1B-20) >= 0 ? OCR1B-20 : 0;
00200         OCR3A = (OCR3A-20) >= 0 ? OCR3A-20 : 0;
00201         OCR3B = (OCR3B-20) >= 0 ? OCR3B-20 : 0;
00202 
00203         White1.value = OCR1A;
00204         White2.value = OCR1B;
00205         White3.value = OCR3A;
00206         White4.value = OCR3B;
